title: Updated: Cyclorise launch Twenty21, a drivetrain component brand with 12-speed chains and cassettes
content:
Cyclorise, UK Distributors of Revel Bikes, Fasst Co, OChain and other brands, have launched their very own drivetrain component brand called Twenty21. Setting out to fill the gaps left by COVID-induced supply chain issues, Twenty21 offer cassettes and chains for 10-, 11- and 12-speed drivetrains, for both SRAM and Shimano setups.Â  Twenty21 Drivetrain Components Twenty21

The post Updated: Cyclorise launch Twenty21, a drivetrain component brand with 12-speed chains and cassettes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
